short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Golf Statistics & charts based on Master Scoreboards players scores page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Does your club post competition results to Master Scoreboard? Master Scoreboard Stats will give you hole by hole statistics based on you Hole-by-Hole-analysis. Once you install the Master Scoreboard Stats extension just go to Hole-by-Hole-analysis from your Recent Player Record page and click on the blue banner in the bottom right hand corner.
